Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
